titleStmt.title: An answer to (vindicate the cause of the nick-named Quakers of such scandalls and untruths as is falsly cast upon them in a lying pamphlet, otherwise called) A discourse concerning the Quakers set out by T.L., or, as I understand the signification of the letters, Tho.? Ledger / by Geo. Baiteman.
titleStmt.author: Baiteman, George.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
